MyWebApp.go:
self.get '/' do 
  main_page 
end

self.get '/class/:name' do 
  class_lookup 
end 

Thread.new { 
  Thread.current[:name] = "MyWebApp"
  self.run!(:server => 'thin')
}

PersistentClass.create:
|superklass|

klass = PersistentClass.new(superklass).klass
puts self.instances
self.instances << klass
return klass

|superklass|

klass = PersistentClass.new(superklass).klass
self.instances << klass
return klass
